best-services-description: Afra Hotel offers you a variety of distinctive rooms and suites 470 rooms that suit your taste for more comfort and luxury. Afra Hotel offers you the best distinguished hospitality services For a more comfortable and quiet stay in Afra Alazizia
reception-description-part1: Enjoy the luxury and spiritual atmosphere
cafes-and-restaurants-description: Live the experience and enjoy the many bounties available through Afra's restaurants and cafes, which offer you the best food and special drinks.
massage-chair-description: Afra Hotel provides you with a massage chair to provide you with more comfort and relaxation
kids-club-description: Afraa Hotel provides you with a children's entertainment hall for more luxury for your children
